newsitem.title: USA: Intervoice sees Q2 EPS between $0.25-$0.27.
newsitem.headline: Intervoice sees Q2 EPS between $0.25-$0.27.

text.p: InterVoice Inc said Wednesday that it expects earnings per common equivalent share to be between $0.25 and $0.27, compared to earnings per share of $0.26 for the quarter ended August 31, 1995.

Based on a preliminary review of results for the second quarter of fiscal 1997 which ended on August 31, 1996, the company expects record revenues of $27 million, compared to revenues of $23.7 million for the quarter ended August 31, 1995.
The company said it received orders valued at $5.1 million from a leading global provider of telecommunications services. -- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.
